thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 87 of 625
thread.title: Judi Herold

author: Judi Herold
title: Judi Herold
text: I have ordered so many adorable outfits...even dresses! When you are gray and over 60, it's so nice to be able to to look cute while working out, walking, or even running errands! The clothes are well made and fit like they are advertised. I have returned items before for an exchange and that was as smooth of a process as the ordering itself. I look forward to my weekly emails from you all!
